title: As Balance Dictates

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out. The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
{{champion:84}} 
Crescent Slash (E) cooldown lowered to 5/4/3/2/1 from 7/6/5/4/3
Crescent Slash (E)  AP ratio increased to .4 from .3

Fret not {{champion:84}}  mains, your freelo has returned.

Special shout out to my boy {{champion:2}}. My freelo is getting stronger.

replies.body: Akali's E probably still sucks. At least Riot are acknowledging that it sucks too.
{{champion:84}} 's e has 40 energy cost this won't rly helps since she still need to aa if she want to detonate the mark.
Hope you like kat ult burst that's never on cooldown, lol. All you can do is pray you outlast her energy bar
